message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with video-based content analysis, specifically action localization, which is a common topic in computer vision (cs.CV). The use of convolutional neural networks and multiple instance learning also suggests a focus on machine learning (cs.LG, cs.AI). The application of the method to the UCF-Sports dataset indicates a focus on multimedia (cs.MM), while the use of unsupervised segmentation and set splitting for regularization suggests a focus on information retrieval (cs.IR).
